title: ¿Cuantas horas llevas de tu vida jugando al League of Legends?

embed.description: Have you ever wondered how much time you spend on LoL ? An average player has spent 1.179 hours on League of Legends and 6.612.245 players took the test. And you ?

body:
Yo llevo **2.717** jugando al League of Legends, que en total son **113** de mi vida jugando.


Y vos cuantas horas y días llevas?

replies.body: A mi me tira 330 horas y juego desde 2015 y he jugado bastante

Hay algo mal, yo empeze a jugarle hace poco pero estoy seguro que mas de 10 horas ya le eh jugado y me dice: You've spent about 0 hours on League of Legends which means 0 days of your life.
You're disabled on las servers and disabled in the world.
Capaz esta pagina no es exacta y todos creen que dice las horas exactas o haya algun error, alguien sabe porque?

agusyagami : You've spent about 399 hours on League of Legends which means 17 days of your life.
You're disabled on las servers and disabled in the world.

no manches tan poco? yo pense que era mas... 
bueno la verdad es que solo llevo casi un año en lol y solo juego 2 ó 3 horas por dia cuando puedo XD

Mooky : You've spent about 3.229 hours on League of Legends which means 135 days of your life.
You're disabled on las servers and disabled in the world.

Akabane Karma : You've spent about 2.839 hours on League of Legends which means 118 days of your life.


GG

> Vaendrys : You've spent about **889** hours on League of Legends which means **37** days of your life.
Con esta cuenta, desde preseason de temporada 6. Tenia otra cuenta pero de mongolo me olvide la contraseña xD

>_"FurchiDC : You've spent about 636 hours on League of Legends which means 27 days of your life."_

Khé? Tan poco ._.?
